divs: sighting detailswe live directly on the ct. river in agawam mass.on 08\10\11 at aprox 10 pm myself and my wife witnessed a very bright crimson ball\sphere hovering on the other side of the river.we watched it stay stationary for maybe 10 seconds when we ran out on the deck.the object then started to slowly drop .we lost sight of it as it went below the tree line.this was definatley not an airplane.i am 99.9% sure this was not a helicopter either.just our luck the object dropped past the tree line just as my wife got her camera.
Summary: glowing orb in sky above tree line
trends: There has been one other sighting in Longmeadow
There were no other sightings in Longmeadow on or around July 10th 2011
